desc: Tread Beauty envisions a world where women are purely confident in themselves knowing they were wonderfully created. We do this by inspiring boldness through luxury beauty products. We provide handcrafted, comfortable, easy-to-apply, cruelty-free luxury false lashes and lash products. Come be a part of our journey.

layout.text: ENJOY ALL THE LUXURY WITH HALF THE LASH
LESS BAND THAN A REGULAR LASH. COMFORTABLE YET STYLISH
